# 8.0 Docs

## Version 8.0

- [Removal of APIs with `configurationName` parameter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/wcf-client/8.0/configurationname-apis.md): Learn about the breaking change in WCF 8 where the APIs that accept a `configurationName` parameter have been removed.
